snippet: The top-ranked Djokovic reached his fifth China Open final and improved his spotless record at the tournament to 23-0 with a 6-3, 6-4 win over Murray on Saturday.
abstract: Novak Djokovic reaches his fifth China Open final and improves his spotless record at the tournament to 23-0 with win over Andy Murray in Beijing; other tennis news noted.
lead_paragraph: The top-ranked Djokovic reached his fifth China Open final and improved his spotless record at the tournament to 23-0 with a 6-3, 6-4 win over Murray on Saturday.

headline.main: Novak Djokovic Beats Andy Murray in Beijing
